title: UB Commons
description: Restaurant food web app for university at buffalo that allows users to search for restaurants and view their menus. Users can create an account, write reviews, rate restaurants and etc.
tech: HTML • CSS • Javascript • Flask • Docker • MongoDB • REST API • CRUD • NGINX

title: VitalCare
description: Remote Patient Monitoring System Web App that allows patients to track their health data and share it with their healthcare providers.
tech: HTML • CSS • Javascript • Python • C++ • Docker • Arduino

title: WAYFARER
description: Indie 2D platformer game with traversable terrain, unique gadgets, special collectibles, immersive story, distinct biomes and etc.
tech: Python • PyGame • Figma • Agile • Kanban • Scrum
